name: Payment_Slip
query:
select id as "Employee ID" , 
    name1 as "Employee Name", 
    DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) as "Working days", start_date as "Start Date" , end_date as "End Date",
    basic_pay as 'BasicPay:Currency:100', 
    (DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)*basic_pay*pf/100 )/pf as "PF Amount", 
    da_days*200 as "DA Amount",
    DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)*basic_pay + (DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)*basic_pay*pf/100 )/pf+da_days*200 as "Salary:Currency:100"
from `tabEmployee_payrole`
where start_date >= %(startdate)s and end_date <= %(enddate)s ;
